ast            : a + b
raw expr       : plus(a::Int8, b::Int16)
checked expr   : plus<Int8, Int16>(a, b)
evaluation:
+--------+---------+---------+---------+
|        | a       | b       | Output  |
+--------+---------+---------+---------+
| Type   | Int8    | Int16   | Int32   |
| Domain | {1..=3} | {2..=6} | {3..=9} |
| Row 0  | 1       | 2       | 3       |
| Row 1  | 2       | 4       | 6       |
| Row 2  | 3       | 6       | 9       |
+--------+---------+---------+---------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+------------------+
| Column | Data             |
+--------+------------------+
| a      | Int8([1, 2, 3])  |
| b      | Int16([2, 4, 6]) |
| Output | Int32([3, 6, 9]) |
+--------+------------------+


ast            : a2 + 10
raw expr       : plus(a2::UInt8 NULL, 10_u8)
checked expr   : plus<UInt8 NULL, UInt8 NULL>(a2, CAST(10_u8 AS UInt8 NULL))
optimized expr : plus<UInt8 NULL, UInt8 NULL>(a2, 10_u8)
evaluation:
+--------+------------------+--------------------+
|        | a2               | Output             |
+--------+------------------+--------------------+
| Type   | UInt8 NULL       | UInt16 NULL        |
| Domain | {1..=3} ∪ {NULL} | {11..=13} ∪ {NULL} |
| Row 0  | 1                | 11                 |
| Row 1  | 2                | 12                 |
| Row 2  | NULL             | NULL               |
+--------+------------------+--------------------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Column | Data                                                                    |
+--------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| a2     | NullableColumn { column: UInt8([1, 2, 3]), validity: [0b_____011] }     |
| Output | NullableColumn { column: UInt16([11, 12, 13]), validity: [0b_____011] } |
+--------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+


ast            : a2 + c
raw expr       : plus(a2::UInt8 NULL, c::UInt32)
checked expr   : plus<UInt8 NULL, UInt32 NULL>(a2, CAST(c AS UInt32 NULL))
evaluation:

|        | a2               | c         | Output             |

| Type   | UInt8 NULL       | UInt32    | UInt64 NULL        |

| Row 0  | 1                | 10        | 11                 |
| Row 1  | 2                | 20        | 22                 |
| Row 2  | NULL             | 30        | NULL               |

| Column | Data                                                                    |

| Output | NullableColumn { column: UInt64([11, 22, 33]), validity: [0b_____011] } |

ast            : c + b
raw expr       : plus(c::UInt32, b::Int16)
checked expr   : plus<UInt32, Int16>(c, b)
evaluation:

|        | b       | c         | Output    |

| Type   | Int16   | UInt32    | Int64     |
| Domain | {2..=6} | {10..=30} | {12..=36} |
| Row 0  | 2       | 10        | 12        |
| Row 1  | 4       | 20        | 24        |
| Row 2  | 6       | 30        | 36        |

| Column | Data                 |

| b      | Int16([2, 4, 6])     |

| Output | Int64([12, 24, 36])  |

raw expr       : plus(c::UInt32, d::Float64)

|        | c         | d          | Output     |

| Type   | UInt32    | Float64    | Float64    |

| Row 0  | 10        | 10         | 20         |
| Row 1  | 20        | -20        | 0          |
| Row 2  | 30        | 30         | 60         |

| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30])   |

| Output | Float64([20, 0, 60])   |

error: 
  --> SQL:1:5
  |
1 | 2.0 / 0
  |     ^ divided by zero while evaluating function `divide(2.0, 0.0)`

+--------+-----------+------------------+-------------+
| Type   | UInt32    | UInt8 NULL       | UInt32 NULL |
| Domain | {10..=30} | {0..=3} ∪ {NULL} | Unknown     |
| Row 0  | 10        | 1                | 10          |
| Row 1  | 20        | NULL             | NULL        |
| Row 2  | 30        | 3                | 10          |
+--------+-----------+------------------+-------------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Column | Data                                                                   |
+--------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30])                                                   |
| d2     | NullableColumn { column: UInt8([1, 0, 3]), validity: [0b_____101] }    |
| Output | NullableColumn { column: UInt32([10, 0, 10]), validity: [0b_____101] } |
+--------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+


error: 
  --> SQL:1:3
  |
1 | c div 0
  |   ^^^ divided by zero while evaluating function `div(10, 0)`



ast            : (a + 3)  % b
raw expr       : modulo(plus(a::Int8, 3_u8), b::Int16)
checked expr   : modulo<Int16, Int16>(plus<Int8, UInt8>(a, 3_u8), b)
evaluation:
+--------+---------+---------+---------+
|        | a       | b       | Output  |
+--------+---------+---------+---------+
| Type   | Int8    | Int16   | Int32   |
| Domain | {1..=3} | {2..=6} | Unknown |
| Row 0  | 1       | 2       | 0       |
| Row 1  | 2       | 4       | 1       |
| Row 2  | 3       | 6       | 0       |
+--------+---------+---------+---------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+------------------+
| Column | Data             |
+--------+------------------+
| a      | Int8([1, 2, 3])  |
| b      | Int16([2, 4, 6]) |
| Output | Int32([0, 1, 0]) |
+--------+------------------+

|        | a2               | c         | Output      |

ast            : c % (b + 3)
raw expr       : modulo(c::UInt32, plus(b::Int16, 3_u8))
checked expr   : modulo<UInt32, Int32>(c, plus<Int16, UInt8>(b, 3_u8))

|        | b       | c         | Output  |

| Type   | Int16   | UInt32    | UInt32  |

| Row 2  | 6       | 30        | 3       |

| Row 2  | 30        | 30         | 3       |

evaluation (internal):

| Column | Data                   |
+--------+------------------------+
| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30])   |
| d      | Float64([10, -20, 30]) |
| Output | Float64([3, 20, 3])    |
+--------+------------------------+

  --> SQL:1:3
  |
1 | c % 0
  |   ^ Division by zero while evaluating function `modulo(10, 0)`
